schema:name: Charles Heidsieck ยง Champagne. Extra Dry. ยง Reims

schema:publisher.schema:name: University of California, Davis. General Library. Dept. of Special Collections

wine_label:marginalia: "In the Spring of 1945, a half bottle of this wine was given by Bacalod Negros, PI, to Major Gen'l Rapp Brush, C.B., 41st Division, following the re-capture of the island by the division.  The bottle had been buried to protect it from the Japs.  When the bottle was opened by Gen'l Brush at Menlo Calif. at Menlo, Calif. in Nov. 45, the wine was flat."
